titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 738) to reform the statutes relating to Amtrak, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-400, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

Rule provides for consideration of S. 738 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. The amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted. All points of order against the bill, as amended, are waived. One motion to commit with or without instructions is made in order. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 135.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

At the Conclusion of debate, the Speaker put the question on agreeing to the resolution and announced that, by voice vote the resolution was agreed to. Ms. Slaughter demanded the Yeas and Nays and further proceedings were postponed.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 324 - 72 (Roll no. 629).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/9/1997--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of S. 738 (Amtrak revisions and authorization).
